attributes.additional_details:
The UK benefits bill now exceeds the revenue from income tax.

Mass immigration into the UK has a massive impact on what is paid in benefit.

It is also well known that organized benefit fraud is wide spread in many immigrant communities and together with unsustainable payments to people who choose to have very large families and not work.

Working people in the UK have had enough of supporting those who choose to contribute nothing to the uk economy.

 I ask the government the following:

Please invest more money investigating benefit fraud:

Pleas consider reducing benefit payments to families with more than 3 children.
